content: The vase is made of porcelain with delicate patterns, and it's quite beautiful. I've placed it on my mantle as a centerpiece. It's in great condition, no chips or cracks, and I'm pretty sure it's been well taken care of over the years. My aunt said it's been passed down through generations, and I'm curious to know more about its history. Do you think I could find any info about it online or should I try to consult with an expert?
